    1: from pandas import (
    2:     Period,
    3:     PeriodIndex,
    4: )
    5: 
    6: 
    7: def test_is_monotonic_increasing():
    8:     # GH#17717
    9:     p0 = Period("2017-09-01")
   10:     p1 = Period("2017-09-02")
   11:     p2 = Period("2017-09-03")
   12: 
   13:     idx_inc0 = PeriodIndex([p0, p1, p2])
   14:     idx_inc1 = PeriodIndex([p0, p1, p1])
   15:     idx_dec0 = PeriodIndex([p2, p1, p0])
   16:     idx_dec1 = PeriodIndex([p2, p1, p1])
   17:     idx = PeriodIndex([p1, p2, p0])
   18: 
   19:     assert idx_inc0.is_monotonic_increasing is True
   20:     assert idx_inc1.is_monotonic_increasing is True
   21:     assert idx_dec0.is_monotonic_increasing is False
   22:     assert idx_dec1.is_monotonic_increasing is False
   23:     assert idx.is_monotonic_increasing is False
   24: 
   25: 
   26: def test_is_monotonic_decreasing():
   27:     # GH#17717
   28:     p0 = Period("2017-09-01")
   29:     p1 = Period("2017-09-02")
   30:     p2 = Period("2017-09-03")
   31: 
   32:     idx_inc0 = PeriodIndex([p0, p1, p2])
   33:     idx_inc1 = PeriodIndex([p0, p1, p1])
   34:     idx_dec0 = PeriodIndex([p2, p1, p0])
   35:     idx_dec1 = PeriodIndex([p2, p1, p1])
   36:     idx = PeriodIndex([p1, p2, p0])
   37: 
   38:     assert idx_inc0.is_monotonic_decreasing is False
   39:     assert idx_inc1.is_monotonic_decreasing is False
   40:     assert idx_dec0.is_monotonic_decreasing is True
   41:     assert idx_dec1.is_monotonic_decreasing is True
   42:     assert idx.is_monotonic_decreasing is False
